- java 1.8 compatibility
- fixed some english
- gradle 4.4 to 4.10.2
- etc

(forgot to delete // [here](https://github.com/butzist/ActivityLauncher/commit/f7e8048967f445929a82dfcd25f2279733690490#diff-f7fc168c92bcfc9496b24e794ed90a43R19), just change it back afterwards)

title: Improve F-Droid listing
body:
I've seen this app on F-Droid, but it lacks screenshots, changelog and a translatable description there. It's pretty easy for you to add these information. Please have a look at [this example](https://github.com/Freeyourgadget/Gadgetbridge/tree/master/fastlane/metadata/android) or at the [F-Droid docs](https://f-droid.org/en/docs/All_About_Descriptions_Graphics_and_Screenshots/#in-the-apps-source-repository) or [fastlane docs](https://github.com/fastlane/fastlane/blob/2.28.7/supply/README.md#images-and-screenshots).
After you have commited these files to your repo and tagged a new version, you need to remove the `Description` and `Summary` from the metadata file in the [F-Droid Data repo](https://gitlab.com/fdroid/fdroiddata).

title: FAQ creation
body:
If I may, would love to add a FAQ document for this project.
If you agree it needs one, I would go ahead. 
If you disagree, it's all fine.

title: Search activities
body: Is there an option to search for specific activities without having to manually scroll through the list looking? If not, can I request it as an enhancement / feature request please.

title: Tagging releases
body:
If you release a new version, please create Git tags.
Please also tag older versions.
This all will help i.e. F-Droid to detect new releases and simplify looking at the code of any specific older version.

title: Create README.md
body:
Hi,

This small and useless PR adds two buttons to get your app on F-Droid and Google Play in a new README üëç

title: Crash creating a shortcut
body:
Creating a shortcut to org.cyanogenmod.cmparts.profiles.ProfilesSettings instantly crashes the app.
LineageOS 14.1

title: allow app to use material design on supported devices
Add Theme Pack Support
body: Would you be able to switch out the drawable chooser to select an installed icon pack and than choose a desired  icon instead.

title: add license title
body: It's not strictly required, but it's useful metadata, and part of the recommended license template text (see http://choosealicense.com/licenses/isc/ and https://opensource.org/licenses/isc-license)

title: Launch private activities
body: Hello, it would be useful if the application. could use SU to launch private activities

title: Add copyright notice and license
body:
Hi,

According to F-Droid wiki, ‚Äúthe build for this version was manually disabled. Reason: license missing‚Äù.

Please indicate an open-source license in a way which is acceptable for F-Droid to pick up. (Possibly add a COPYING or LICENSE file at the root of the source code repository, spelling out the license in its contents.)

In this PR, I chose the ISC license for you, but consider browsing for yourself at http://choosealicense.com/licenses/isc/.

Thanks,
Amir
